channel.title: CVE Feed for devcert -- devcert
channel.description: The latest CVEs for devcert -- devcert

item.title: CVE-2022-1929|2024-08-03T00:17:00.987Z -- devcert -- devcert
item.description: An exponential ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) can be triggered in the devcert npm package, when an attacker is able to supply arbitrary input to the certificateFor method
